content.question: The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the derivative of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown above for <math alttext="0 less than x, less than 9 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true for <math alttext="0 less than x, less than 9 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has one relative minimum and two relative maxima.
<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has two relative minima and one relative maximum.
<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has two relative minima and two relative maxima.
<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has three relative minima and two relative maxima.

content.answer: <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has one relative minimum and two relative maxima.
